artist: Engraver: Jacob Matham; after Hendrick Goltzius
inscription: To left of figure's head, in the image: AEstas |  To left of left foot, in the image: HG Inue / 2. | Inscribed in plate around circumference: Aestas maturatis fecundat frigibus anuum. Illius exornant Spicea Serta caput. Illius aduentu Cancer terrasque salumque. Illustrat, cereri rustica turba litat.
provenance: Private collection, United States; (Childs Gallery, Boston); sold to MIA, 2007.
title: Allegory of Summer
